description.value:
Requires MidiQOL, DAE

You learn how to use fear to take advantage of the weak spot of a creature. if the creature is afflicted by Frightened you attack with advantage. If you successfully hit you score a critical hit against it, adding an extra 2d12 force damage on the hit. You can activate this effect three times per long rest.
